title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 664.6 - Depreciation and amortization subsidiary records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 664.6 - Depreciation and amortization subsidiary records

State Regulations
(a) Subsidiary record categories shall be
maintained for each class of depreciable telecommunications plant in account
3100 for which there is a prescribed depreciation rate. (See also section
664.1
[c]
of this

Part.)
(b) Subsidiary records shall
be maintained for accounts 3410, 3420, 3500, and 3600 in accordance with
section
664.5
(d) of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
664.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
